response.overview: KINGS VISION GIVES YOU AN EXCLUSIVE AND INTIMATE INSIDE LOOK AT THE MOMENTS THAT MADE THE LA KINGS THE 2012 STANLEY CUP© CHAMPIONS. FOLLOW THE 2011-12 PLAYOFFS, FROM JARRET STOLL'S OVERTIME GOAL AGAINST VANCOUVER, TO THE CELEBRATION AFTER GAME 6 OF THE STANLEY CUP® FINAL.  THESE INSPIRATIONAL STORIES, TOLD BY FAMILIAR FACES SUCH AS ANZE KOPITAR, DUSTIN BROWN, BOB MILLER AND JIM FOX, TELL THE JOURNEY OF THE EIGHTH-SEED LA KINGS AND THE MOMENTS THAT MADE THEIR PLAYOFFS NOTHING SHORT OF INCREDIBLE.  RELIVE THE HITS, THE GOALS, THE TEARS AND ALL THE UNFORGETTABLE MEMORIES IN KINGS VISION'S ENTIRE SERIES, "2012 STANLEY CUP® MOMENTS."
response.title: 2012 Stanley Cup Moments
